overview: Five social media influencers are invited to a private resort in a remote province to create a series of promotional posts highlighting the resort owned by a mysterious benefactor. The resort is said to be haunted. Part of the competition is to catch the ghost on camera and whoever had a clear shot of the phantom gets 500,000 pesos. But what turns out to be a prank show set up by the social media star turns horrifying as the group stumbles out of the resort's confines and into the jungle something monstrous awaits.
title: Kuta
